text: I love to go back to my home church, when I go south to visit family. There's still a lot of the people I was raised with there. But also many new people. It's still a very friendly, spirit filled church. I'm hoping to get to go there the first of July, while visiting family.

text: We love this church family and atmosphere.

name: Deb Randall

name: Debora Wade
text: Caring, devoted to God's word and filled with the holy spirit. You will be blessed.

name: Dale Bennett
text: Very friendly place with great real-truth messages IAW God's word. No fluff and lots of opportunity to grow spiritually.

name: Rhonda Mayes
text: Love you all

text: Love my home church, awesome!

name: Tiffany Jones
text: Very friendly!

name: Jackie McMillan
text: God is present and working in this church. I'm excited to get a good word from the Pastor and enjoy their praise and worship. You can feel the presence of the Lord in this house of God.

name: Jinx Barry
text: I go here every Sunday and the service is wonderful, it breaks my heart to see barely anyone there when at one point it used to be filled with nothing but life. But I have hope from the lord himself, his own ideas that has been given to me, I will spread the word of the church and I shall invite many.

text: Very uplifting place to be on Sunday!

name: Jill Cannon
text: Great place

name: Bobbie Bowens BB1323
text: Lovely church

name: Ronald P. Dyer
text: Great worship and preaching. People are friendly and there is something for all ages.

name: Timothy Watson
text: HFA is truly a church after God's heart as they desire to invest in your spiritual walk with the Lord. This church strives to reach the lost, serve compassionately, teach the truth, and worship with passion. Hartselle First is family structured with a place for those of all ages. If your looking for a church to call home, this is the place to be. God Bless!

name: joehartselle
text:
HFA Church is such a great church. The pastor is devoted to building others. You can see it in everything this church does. They also have classes and small groups for anyone.

Most importantly, the people at this church go out of their way to show Christ’s love & to help & be involved with individuals’ lives. They do all this without being overwhelming.

name: Chloe Carpenter
text: HFA is a great church full of loving people. They have great small groups and messages full of God’s word. If you get the chance, come and check it out. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Patrick Mccormick
text: Their a church that follows God's heart and is always happy to see new people, welcome them and make them feel at home.

name: Kim
text: Friendly and warm ,wonderful preaching from the scripture.

name: Jonathan Cowger
text: Awesome church! Amazing pastors! This church loves. Accepts. And forgives!

name: Troy Bryant
text: Great people.

name: Yorge Garcia
text:
(Translated by Google) I greet you from Venezuela God bless you greatly

(Original)

name: Rene' Vawter
text: Not my church, but would be if I lived in that area. I have many close friends who do attend there.  They are salt of the earth.  They live what they preach! You can trust this church family.

name: Samuel Hunt
text: The youth programs are amazing! We attend on wednesday evenings. Wednesdays rock because members are allowed to

name: Sharon Robinson
text: Loving & caring group of people.  Pastor preaches the Word of God & makes it interesting.  Theme for our church is VICTORY this year.  We are believing for that in several areas of the church & individual lives.

name: Johnny Jones
text: Long time church member and permanent addition to this wonderful family of God worshiping people.  If your looking for a church, make it a priority to visit the Sunday morning service.  Worship service is "hand raising" and the Word is discussed with lite humor but digs deep at how the Bible pertains to our family, city and world on a daily basis.

name: Kevin Brust
text:
Weatherly Assembly is one of the best churches I have had the honor to attend. The church is a true reflection of Christ, grace, mercy, and love as described in the Bible.

Pastor (Nick Martinez), the pastoral staff, along with the various department/ministry leaders are Godly, gifted & dynamic leaders with a true heart for all. They provide full gospel/biblical direction through clearly understood teachings which are relevant to all people. They care for each person that walks through the doors and equally care for those who have not.

There are even some ministries and connecting points (small groups) within the church which are more focused and/or geared towards specific ages (infants, toddlers, children, youth, singles, married, families, widows, single mothers, elderly, men, woman, boys, girls etc…)

The church pastor, leaders and members all pull together to help those in need, provide continual prayer, encouragement, support, discipleship, leadership, character building, personal growth, spiritual growth, Godly wisdom, discernment and insight. There is a deep passion for our community, city, state, country, and missions within the leaders & church members. No matter your background, situation, pain, past hurts, struggles, failures or situation they care and love you as Jesus Christ does. This church comes along side you, is there for you, prays, encourages, and stands with you, equally in both the toughest of times/situations as well as in the good/happy times/situations.

This truly is “a place to belong”.

name: Thomas Webber
text: Weatherly is extremely enjoyable and friendly. If you're looking for a place to find people to do life with, this is the place. Teachings are  straight from the bible!!! Very welcoming!!!! Pastor Nick is amazing and everyone is like family. This church is all about serving and showing the love of Jesus!!!! If your looking for a church home come see for yourself.

name: John Robinson
text: This is home.  I came back to Huntsville when I retired from the Army because of this church.  These folks are family.  Such a loving atmosphere.  Have been back in this church for 22 years now.  Come see us.

name: Robocathy
text: One of the best churches I've ever been to. The people are so loving and genuine, and the Pastor is truly a man of God!

name: Greg Vawter
text: Still a great family friendly church!

name: Paul Davoren
text: I attend here regularly

name: FlyBill24
text: A very friendly, family atmosphere. God is exalted and worshipped.

name: Alyn Sued
text:
I am very disappointed. I placed on their website a prayer request and never was posted. They pick and choose. This was my prayer request : " Please pray for all the children that are victims of sexual abuse and molesting. Pray for those teenagers and young adults that are suffering now due to being molested as a child. Pray for those victims who try to commit suicide or have suicidal thoughts because of the flasbacks they get from the abuse. Pray for justice because at times it is not served or does not come fast enough."
All I got was an email with excuses of how the Pastor was on vacation and that was the reason they gave but there are many prayers that have posted after my request. Very disappointed.

name: Patrick Mccormick
text: You can feel there love there. They care and it ain't hard to connect at all.

name: Marshall Smith
text: I like it

name: Stephanie TheAnimeLover
text: Wonderful honest and sincere leadership who genuinely care about their community.

resp.text: Hey, Stephanie! Thank you so much for your kind words. We love having you as a part of the CLF family!

name: Tabitha Perry
text: Very sweet ppl here

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Tabitha! We hope to see you again! 😄

name: Ashley Holt
text: Love my Church family!

resp.text: We love having you as a part of the CLF family, Ashley!

name: Shea Barnett
text: Wonderful honest and sincere leadership who genuinely care about their community. They make you feel welcome and allow you go be a part of their family immediately! They also have a recovery program that has been and continues to be very successful as they teach bible based ways to live the life they long for as they help along the way as well as in their future after program completion. These guys teach Christ because they care, all of which are volunteer leaders including the Pastor-- which shows how much they care about God's calling for them to serve. If you are looking for an awesome bible based church--you found it!! 😀😀 God is doing wonderful things for this church!

text: The word of God is preached here, no sugar coating.

name: Matthew Mcrae
text: 2004 I started going to the church I continued on going learning so much knowledge wisdom and Dr Danner is most definitely being lead by the holy spirit I know from tha most powerful an wonderful feeling came upon me I received tha spiritual prayer language which I can speak directly to GOD by speaking in our prayer language which is tha gift of speaking in tongues I always went to service threw tha years and always seen the holy spirit speak threw them I never understood it completely until 2004 I received tha holy spirit and asked for Jesus to come into my heart and clean me up and protect me from the demons I've been  battling for years let's just say this place is on fire with the Holy spirit if u want to be with our creator and really get close to him First assembly I's the place

name: M Strickland
text: I love this church! Grew up here and it’s family! Very spirit filled church and Brother Danner is an amazing pastor!

name: Sarah Clark
text: It is truly the best church I've been to. God has done amazing things in this place and in the lives of many. Our pastor is outstanding and spiritually led. It's truly on fire. (Holy ghost fire) you can't (shouldn't be able to) leave the same way you came in! Love it!

name: Frank
text: It's a good holy ghost-filled church a good place to go to get fed in the spirit Pastor Danner as a wise Godly Man he encourages other people to use their spiritual gifts it's a good place to grow closer to God and deserve him and others has a very good youth program where the kids can grow spiritually and that's very important for our next generation and we still have church on Sunday night most churches are closed on Sunday night

name: DAVID GODWIN
text: Great church and great people there. Where you can feed your soul.

name: Lisa Ann Bell
text:
This church gave me my foundation, the beginning of a beautiful relationship with my Lord and Saviour! My fondest memories are singing in the choir and communion, because the Holy Ghost was so strong for me during these times.
I lost my fear of platform fright and realized it wasn't about me but Him. Jesus has prevailed on a moment by moment bases in my life and I have suffered, but I count it all joy to suffer with Christ Jesus!
That voice of Pastor Danner has never left my head, not my heart and the people will forever be in my heart...

Lisa Bell

name: Jacqueline Moffett
text: Every time I have been to this Church, it has been an amazing visit. I especially like the illustrated sermons. It has the most diverse group of members, that reall embrace their visitors....

text: I visited their school, Veritas. The staff was friendly, the students were awesome, and I felt welcomed! I loved sharing my "Traveling Teresa" books with them. Looking forward to going back soon when my new book comes out!

text: Pastor tell the truth straight from the Bible and as he's led ! Praise and Worship team is fantastic! Go and be blessed!

text: A great music program and the pastor is excellent. The congregation is not overly friendly or outgoing. If you go to socialize, you might be disappointed. However, if you go for praise and worship, and for a great message from God's word; definitely recommended.

name: Dorothea Mason
text: Wonderful church with such good  loving people that care about YOU. The Bible is taught in this church. Always offering seminars and classes with alot of information to help you and family.💖

name: Charlene Shealey-Heath
text: First time visiting this church tonight. Everyone was so friendly and blessed us at every station they had set up. The giveaway of the bikes blew my mind but the generosity of the ppl touched me even more. There needs to be more showing of love like this in the community

text: They are always so nice!! And they always have something interesting for the kids to do, ❤❤

text: Great Place

text: Good worship service, real kids involved

name: Rani Chapman
text: Friendly and knowledgeable. Great place to worship

name: Sabrina Shavers
text: My family loves this church! For the longest time we could not seem to fit in anywhere and we found our home here. The services are incredible and there are two different time if you cant make one or the other. They have nurseries for my two year old, kid zone for my 8 year old, and we make sure to come to the 10:45 service so my teenager can go to epic trufire for teenagers. The staff is great and there is no other place we would want to be.

name: Todd Benoit
text: I had been out of church for nearly a year. Got invited to Lomax by my best friend, and I'm so glad I went. They make you feel so welcomed. I immediately felt like a part of the Lomax Family. I can't wait until my husband has a Sunday off so he can join me. Pastor Jeff is a wonderful pastor, he doesn't sugar coat things, and your toes may get stepped on, but that's what I needed (need). I would definitely recommend this church to anyone, and everyone. God bless

name: Greg Gibson
text: Great people. Very friendly. Intent on following God's direction. Leadership second to none anywhere else.

name: Brian Millican
text: My wife and I were members here for a number of years. We had to move away from the area last year, and we certainly miss our family at Lomax. If you're searching for a new home church or your first home church, look no further. Take my word, this is the place for you. Pastor Jeff, the staff, and the church body are top-notch.

name: Matthew Stone
text: Lomax is my Family. This is the only church that I've been excited to attend services. This church has the accountability needed to keep their people on the right track. Love Lomax

name: jamie edwards
text: Great all-around Church, everyone's very nice and welcoming, the services incorporate great Christian music with strong and impactful messages. Me and my daughter are both happy to be part of it.
